Zamp-1.1.43-Win64   10/19/2016
=================================
Added "Play From Here" to right-click menu.
Song will start at the beginning if calculated start time is < 2 seconds.
Disable right-click menu when playing.
Fix bug with delete.
Added 64 bit VLC note.

Zamp-1.0.41-Win64   10/12/2016
=================================
Let's call this 1.0.
